title: Home
text:
Ebenezer Makinde
PhD Candidate in Political Science
I study anti-corruption politicization, elite political behavior, and how citizens respond to institutionalized corruption. My research spans comparative politics, African political economy, and public policy, with a focus on Nigeria.

Research: Anti-corruption, political economy, African politics, public policy

Email: your@email.com
